member.name: P:Aaron.Reports.My.Resources.Resources.ChartReport
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <FlowDocument xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:xrd="clr-namespace:CodeReason.Reports.Document;assembly=CodeReason.Reports" xmlns:crcv="clr-namespace:CodeReason.Reports.Charts.Visifire;assembly=CodeReason.Reports.Charts.Visifire" PageHeight="29.7cm" PageWidth="21cm" ColumnWidth="21cm"> <xrd:ReportProperties> <xrd:ReportProperties.ReportName>Ch [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:Aaron.Reports.My.Resources.Resources.ChartTable
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <Paragraph> <crcv:ColumnChart TableName="{0}" TableColumns="{1},{2}" Width="{3}cm" Height="{4}cm" View3D="{5}" Title="{6}"></crcv:ColumnChart> </Paragraph>.

member.name: P:Aaron.Reports.My.Resources.Resources.MyText
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <xrd:SectionDataGroup DataGroupName="Group2"> <Paragraph FontSize="20" FontWeight="Bold" BorderThickness="2">{1}</Paragraph> <Table CellSpacing="0" BorderBrush="Black" BorderThickness="2"> <TableRowGroup Style="{StaticResource headerFooterRowStyle}"> <xrd:TableRowForDynamicHeader TableName="{2}"/> </TableRowGroup>
<TableRowGroup Style="{StaticResource dataRowStyle}"> <xrd:TableRowForDynamicDataTable TableName="{0}"/> </TableRowGroup> [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:Aaron.Reports.My.Resources.Resources.Template1

Looks up a localized string similar to <FlowDocument xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:xrd="clr-namespace:CodeReason.Reports.Document;assembly=CodeReason.Reports" PageHeight="29.7cm" PageWidth="21cm" ColumnWidth="21cm">
<FlowDocument.Resources> <!-- Style for header/footer rows. --> <Style x:Key="headerFooterRowStyle" TargetType="{x:Type TableRowGroup}"> <Setter Property=" [rest of string was truncated]";.
